name: picolite
description:
picolite is a space trading and combat game for the pico8 fantasy console, based on elite: the new kind (christian pinder, link) from the original classic by david braben and ian bell (link).

flight controls:

  • left/right - roll
  • up/down - climb
  • o - fire
  • x+left/right - switch between lasers and missiles
  • x+up/down - accelerate/decelerate
  • pause menu - hyperspace/auto pilot/ecm/energy bomb

dock controls:

  • pause menu - change screen
  • o - select planet
  • x - launch
  • up/down - change item/scroll
  • left/right - sell/buy item

hud - fs (front shield), as (aft shield), ct (cabin temperature), lt (laser temperature), al (altitude), sp (speed), fu (fuel)

** under development **

this project is currently under development, if you spot any bugs please let me know. features may change and there will be gameplay and balance issues.
